title: Oedipus Rex. No. 1. The age of Sophocles

brief_description: An interpretation of Sophocles Oedipus Rex, with historical background of the Ancient Greeks, and a discussion of its relevance to our times, including the nature and meaning of man. Suitable for upper secondary level.
